title: Avengers: AGE OF ULTRON movie logo Subtitle
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422023916im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AAOU_RO_TT_noshadow%20rezixe_6037.jpg)
  
^this is from the Romanian version (i think), attached it because it has more characters.

More commonly seen in the english version like this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422023916im_/http:/typophile.com/files/aou%20font%20id_5356.JPG)

This font's non-italic variant was used in the AGE OF ULTRON comic book logo. Cropped and modded for character separation (badly, I know I didn't have better sources) here:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422023916im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture_5701.JPG)

Thanks in advance.
author: seavoclu

comments.content:
I didn't spot it after a brief search.  
Looks similar to some of the Sci-Fi/Techno fonts by Dan Zadorozny [http://www.iconian.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422023916/http:/www.iconian.com/ "http://www.iconian.com/")  
Don
Ghost Clan seems to be close from that page but the A's and E's don't match among other differences.

Ghost Clan Italic has similar stroke widths.  
Here are some letters edited to make some of the rounded corners square

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422023916im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GhostClanEditedAsSUBSE_4742.jpg)
 Further editing would make a closer match.  
Don

It would but I'm lazy :) but thanks anyway. Until we can get THE one, this'll help.  
Still holding out for the exact one.
